body: Dozens of students of the University of Puerto Rico and other activists have been arrested today while participating in acts of civil disobedience at the main campus in Río Piedras against the imposition of a special tuition fee. The student blog Desde Adentro [es] and the student radio station Radio Huelga [es]  are offering live coverage. The hashtags #huelgaUPR and #luchaUPR are being used to follow the conversation.
original_body: Dozens of students of the University of Puerto Rico and other activists have been arrested today while participating in acts of civil disobedience at the main campus in Río Piedras against the imposition of a special tuition fee. The student blog Desde Adentro [es] and the student radio station Radio Huelga [es] are offering live coverage. The hashtags #huelgaUPR and #luchaUPR are being used to follow the conversation.
title: Puerto Rico: Arrests for Acts of Civil Disobedience

sentence: Dozens of students of the University of Puerto Rico and other activists have been arrested today while participating in acts of civil disobedience at the main campus in Río Piedras against the imposition of a special tuition fee.
The student blog Desde Adentro [es] and the student radio station Radio Huelga [es]  are offering live coverage.
The hashtags #huelgaUPR and #luchaUPR are being used to follow the conversation.
